name: Park City Resort
description: Park City Mountain Resort is conveniently located within a 35-minute drive of Salt Lake City International Airport. With base and summit elevations at 6,800 feet and 10,000 feet, this massive mountain boasts 348 trails.

name: Brighton Resort
description: Brighton is loads of fun for the whole family.  Located just outsaide SLC up Big Cottonwood, its a convenient gem!

name: Deer Valley Resort
description: Deer Valley is a skiers only exclusive resort experience.  Priced for exclucivity, Deer Valley is an experience to try for those who roll deep.
